reviews.review_msg: FANTASTIC! She is passionate, interesting, and gives fair exams. She is intelligent, and willing to help students through the boring text. She is encouraging and totally not one of the typical holier than thou profs/TAs you normally get at SFU.

Great intentions...but lack of english grammer skills made the class a little challenging. Also, his method of using one empirical study as a case study for the whole semster was difficult to understand until the end of the semester. Some of the concepts were pretty abstract (like conceptualization).
